item.title: 2024.01-, National Natural Science Foundation of China (62332005), Participant
item.description: During his Ph.D., he participated in the National Natural Science Foundation of China’s key project “Open Source Software Trustworthiness Analysis and Assurance Methodology”.

item.title: 2023.12-, National Key Research and Development Program of China (2023YFB3107103), Participant.
item.description: During his Ph.D., he participated in the project promotion of the National Key Research and Development Program of China “Screening and Recommendation of Information Content for Susceptible Groups”.

item.title: 2023.01-, National Natural Science Foundation of China (62262073), Participant
item.description: During his master’s degree, as a technical backbone, he led four master’s students to participate in the application of this National Natural Science Foundation of China, and after this project was successfully declared, he participated in the project as the first student and completed an invention patent.

item.title: 2021.12-2023.11, National Key Research and Development Program of China (2021YFF1201102), Participant.
item.description: During his PhD, as a technical backbone, he led one doctoral student, six master’s students and five undergraduates to successfully complete the project advancement of the National Key Research and Development Program of China : Research and development of flexible big data cloud platform support system for joint research among large cohorts - Research on Cross-cohort Data Security Sharing Mechanism and Trusted Analysis Technology.

item.title: 2021.04-2024.03, Yunnan Province Applied Basic Research Program Project (202101AT070098), Participant
item.description: During his master’s degree, as a technical backbone, he led four master’s students to participate in the writing of this provincial special application, and after the successful declaration of this project, he participated in the project as the first student and published CNKI highly cited and highly downloadable papers one.

item.title: 2020.09-2021.06, Yunnan Normal University Research Innovation Project for Postgraduate Students (ysdyjs2020148), Leader.
item.description: As a project leader during his master’s degree, he led five master’s students to complete this university-level science and innovation project.
